name: Rectangle Guy
description: Introducing Rectangle Guy, a brand new game by The Bare Minimum Studios. Rectangle Guy (game) features Rectangle Guy (character) in this platforming adventure! With over 30 levels and 6 boss fights and a plethora of post-game content, there's plenty to do and see in this wacky game.

name: Demon Path: Tower of Armagor
description: The game focuses on the adventure of a demon who decides to leave the planet by finding a portal. Reach the bottom of the tower, overcoming 1,000 randomly generated levels. Build a base for defense and recovery. Maybe you will succeed...

name: Garden Business
description: Create your own farm, collect the grown crops and sell them, build your own house and improve it.

name: Quantum Coherence
description: A philosophical adventure game where you shoot and BLINC your way to save the universe. A delightful mixture of space combat and first person exploration. It's up to you and your skill to save everyone from entropy.

name: Echo Wars: Road Rage
description: Drive with one hand while shooting with the other, making your way through the memory lane of the Echo Brothers, two old cyber soldiers whose wacky and hectic memories you'll relive thanks to the magic of VR, in an adventure that can also be played in cooperative mode.

name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons: Design My Forest 2
description: Are you addicted to design & decorating? You can play with it now to design your dream forest with the most adorable foxes!

name: My Furry Trainer
description: A new year - a new life! This year I'll definitely start working out, I will achieve my goals! Now I just have to find a good trainer...

name: Furry Boss
description: Office work is boring as hell, especially when your boss is not a hot woman who likes to tease you. Gladly, we can show you how it feels to have one!

name: My Sexual Hospitalization
description: Souma, the main character, is hospitalized and falls in love at first sight with his doctor, Dr. Isami! Even though he keeps getting dumped, he is undeterred and makes a fierce attack, involving "boobs"! Eventually, the doctor begins to enjoy the silly interactions with Souma.

name: Recondo
description: From the creator of Mud and Blood. Recondo is a hardcore real-time tactics simulation that has you leading a Ranger team behind the enemy lines during the Vietnam war. Plan, missions, equip your team and patrol behind enemy lines in a procedurally generated open world.

name: Falinere Fantasy
description: Falinere Fantasy is a turn-based RPG Dungeon Crawler played via Twitch Chat. Your viewers can change between 7 different classes (Druid, Alchemist, Crystalsmith, Bard, Warrior, Rogue, and Wizard) and run through dungeons, leveling up and gaining skills as they traverse the land.

name: Slime Runner
description: Explore the treacherous realm as a slime, all while being protected by an ethereal entity in this precision-based platformer. Explore numerous regions, surpass the most difficult challenges, and find your way towards FREEDOM.

name: Duppy Detective Tashia
description: Help Tashia unravel the mystery of her stolen shadow in this choice-driven adventure based on Caribbean folklore!

name: Tankron
description: Tankron is a top-down wave survival roguelike in which you fight an ever-increasing amount and variety of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades to stand a chance. Discover and choose between 21 different tank specializations to enhance your Build.

description: Collect riches, fight monsters, unlock secrets and balance the task for which you have been chosen, saving humanity from an evil Saurian alien species by participating in a single player, fast paced, top down, permadeath, looter shooting, retro style game of Battle Ball.

name: Duct Tape Simulator
description: Duct Tape Simulator - In this game you act as duct tape and you have to fix cracked and broken things. Search the room for damaged items and repair them to fill up the integrity bar.

name: Fury Life

name: Dream Walk: Stolen Color

name: Empis
description: Empis is a turn-based strategy game that focuses on short and sweet multiplayer matches. Choose from individual factions each with their own unique units and upgrades, unlock technology, and build sprawling cities with buildings and fortifications.

name: Orb Fort
description: A unique super-tight platformer with varied, highly challenging platforming and enemies. Run, dash, jump, and shoot to make your way through the secret fort and recover the stolen power orb. Featuring (currently) more than 150 difficult screens. Fast deaths and lightning-fast respawns.

description: In a surreal universe that is controlled by music, you must sneak, climb and crawl through an army of mysterious agents. Playable in third-person (non-VR) or first-person (VR), you are armed with a musical spray paint and hook gun to help you follow and alter the musical landscape.

description: Runeseeker is an adventure RPG in the tradition of text adventures and story-heavy RPGs, with a small influence of retro Japanese RPGs. In a world controlled by power hungry god-emperors, do you strive to be the leader to knock them down?

name: RollCats
description: A futuristic racing game across the galaxy. Huge cats rolling on massive wheels. Drifts, weapons and crazy speed tests your driving skills!

name: R.I.P. Tour
description: A death game visual novel where murder victims are decided by group consensus. Make friends and enemies, solve the mysteries of an abandoned amusement park, and suss out the traitor in your group.

name: Train Simulator: Holzkirchen - W√∂rgl Route
description: All aboard for Austria! Take charge of cross-border passenger & freight traffic with RSSLO‚Äôs Holzkirchen - W√∂rgl route for Train Simulator.

name: Toy Sports
description: With Toy Sports, you will return to an exciting and very special place: your childhood memories. Now it is YOUR time to be the toy you love, drive cars, compete in various sports for points, prizes and glory. Prepare your engines and play with the whole family!

name: ToyBox Security
description: ToyBox Security is a team based 4 player online action comedy game where kids left home alone must use traps to fend off dimwitted burglars.

name: The Lost Delinquents of Rollings High
description: "The Lost Delinquents of Rollings High" A visual novel, choose your own adventure game, with an 80s anime inspired look and feel.

name: The City Cards Challenge
description: Relax with this challenge by building your city and placing the cards buildings with different effects in an optimal way for the residents.

name: The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault
description: The wastes of Dubai have been overwhelmed by Screamers. Play and evolve the iconic characters from the hit novel; The Chronicles: Wasteland and take back the dead lands. Survive against the horror and use whatever it takes to last long enough to build sanctions, unlock characters and items.

name: The Birthday
description: This is a non-typical RPG game. Most of the elements of an RPG are not including in this game except controlling the protagonist, some triggered events, and items. The game purpose is searching and collecting enough candles in finite time. Sometimes you have to think in this game.

name: Terrorform
description: Terrorform is a modern take on classic FPS games. Blast your way through a space station and leave a wake of destruction in your wake.

name: Silentium
description: Delve into the labyrinth and decide your fate! A 2D turn-based RPG with dungeon building aspects. Farm, grow weapons, create new class combinations, and make hard decisions that will have consequences.

name: Shift of War
description: Get ready to perform all kinds of jobs such as eliminating the most wanted terrorists or recovering vital merchandise. All of this is represented in this top-down shooter game where you can play alone or with up to 4 friends in local multiplayer mode.

name: Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold
description: Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold is a co-op action roguelike where, in teams of up to four, players dive into the world of the Seven Dwarfs and aim to save Snow White from her unenviable fate by fending off enemies and defeating the forces of evil.

name: Seafrog
description: Seafrog is an action platformer where you use a giant wrench to perform tricks and combos in order to fly up walls and stick to ceilings! Explore hundreds of hand crafted levels as you grind enemies, complete platforming challenges, and defy gravity to escape a mysterious sinkhole in the ocean.

name: Alight: Lunar Survival
description: Stranded in the darkness, survive and build a base scattered across the lunar surface to generate electricity and alight the moon as you upgrade your equipment, struggle for oxygen, and escape fearsome monsters. Alone or together you will survive, gather, craft, build, and explore.

name: Lucid
description: Discover your own legend in Lucid. Platform through a crystalline world torn apart by calamity, absorb powerful abilities that expand movement and enhance combat against a diverse cast of enemies and bosses, all in gorgeous pixel art inspired by the golden age of 2D sidescrollers.

name: Kindergarten
description: Caring for children is a cinch, right? Meet Mila, the super sweet owner of the Kindergarten daycare. Help her begin with one adorable baby then grow her business to an ultra baby boom. Keep the little ones happy by fulfilling their needs in the form of hunger, sleep, diaper changing, playtime, and vomit-free zones. The social rating shows your popularity with the parents in this bubbly time-management game. Are you the next daycare owner in high demand?

name: The Grizzled: Armistice Digital
description: In The Grizzled: Armistice Digital, players take on the role of soldiers facing the Trials and Hard Knocks of the first World War. They work cooperatively across a campaign where they confront the major events of the war. From the introduction scenario of Boot Camp, through the nine different Missions, everything that happens carries forward and affects the next steps of the game. Players will need to make good decisions and support each other if they hope to make it to the end of the war alive.

name: The Hard Game
description: Can you beat these five HARD levels? Who knows, you may just get some "lovely rewards" for your efforts!

name: The Hunted
description: Horror based and survial strategy game

name: The Impossible Knight Runner
description: The Impossible Knight Runner is an intense hack-and-slash platformer full of creatures trying to put an end to your adventure. Enter the dungeon with courage and decisiveness as the slightest misstake will be your downfall.

name: The Legend of Capa Negra
description: The Legend of Capa Negra is a souls-like Action-RPG set in a medieval, dark fantasy world. As a new member of the Rebel Faction, your first mission will be to travel to a small village to meet a contact, find your way through dangerous landscapes, and join the war against the King!

name: The Lightkeeper
description: The magnetism of a cursed island in the middle of the ocean. Loneliness and fear in its pure state. The Lightkeeper is a first-person game where you will delve into the most unfathomable mysteries of the human being without neglecting your main mission: to keep the lighthouse lit.

name: The Original Island
description: The Original IslandIs an open world island survival RPG independently developed by Lanmeng technology. From the main perspective of the victim, Lin Yunfeng, it depicts a beautiful and dangerous, magnificent and mysterious island, and tries to solve its secrets.

name: The Peak Climb VR
description: Peak Climb VR will bring you an action-packed full-time professional climbing experience and give you exciting moments. While every part of this experience will entertain you, it will also provide you with a tiring calorie burn and game music will provide you with spiritual therapy.

name: The Unexplained
description: The Unexplained is a paranormal/psychological horror game where you and up to 6 people can go to various locations to discover and find the deep dark hidden secrets! But beware of the spirits left behind as we don't know if they are friendly.

name: The Wassie Games
description: Do you have what it takes to survive the wassie games? This is the ultimate test of a wassie's skill and determination! There can be only one winner, so only the bravest wassies should choose to compete in this multi-level Battle Royale.

name: The Wave of Monk√©
description: The Wave of Monk√© is an action-comedy RPG set in the internetwork of the multiverse. Explore the journey of a gorilla wanting to be more... evolved.

name: The Wild: Survival Game
description: Your plane broke down. Survive and find out how to escape from the island

name: TimeLost
description: TimeLost is a soulslike action fighter that puts players in the driver's seat of their abilities, demanding quick thinking and precise execution. With seamless weapon swapping at the core of combat, every decision counts as you dodge, block, and disrupt enemy maneuvers on your way to victory.

name: Total Tank Generals
description: Every war has its Generals. Take command of an army during World War II and lead them to victory. Strategize your way through many scenarios and real historical military campaigns of past generals.

name: The Twilight of Infinity: Episode 4 - Therefore I Am
description: "If only I'd paid attention in French class" was something Alex could only say in English, which is not helpful when in 16th century France trying to help victims of the Black Death..

name: Sowa VR
description: SOWA VR - is a multiplayer virtual reality shooter with a focus on community features. Realistic and simplified recharge features and fast paced combat as part of the core experience. Challenge yourself on the battlefield in our Sowa vr game.

name: Space Gold Rush TD
description: Join in on the next gold rush and become a prospector in space. In this unique tower defense you can set up and reposition towers for maximum efficiency and adapt to the environment.

name: Speedrunner's Paradise: Sky is the limit
description: This game is a simple 3D platformer. It is very easy to understand the mechanics of the game, and anyone can play. But, can anyone finish this game? Anyway, as i was saying. This game is an experience. Will you enjoy it? I don't know. Maybe, you should.....Try it yourself!?!?!?!

name: Survival Epoch
description: In the post-Soviet space, among the abandoned alleys of the city, broken houses, everyone is trying to survive, in search of food, weapons and ammunition, you will stumble upon enemies or friends who will later become your companions and support in these harsh conditions.

name: Tales of Guards Elves
description: This is an RPG with novel combat gameplay. combat random. Players can capture their favorite Weilings, roll dice for movement, place and upgrade Weilings for layout, and fight under novel rules that allow the protagonist to unleash skills.

name: Plan B: Goddess's cards
description: As soon as Plan B starts, you secretly arrest a number of suspects, all sexy beauties without exception. You have given up torture this time, and perhaps a tongue-in-cheek battle is more suitable for this interrogation. . .

name: Poly Parkour
description: Test your skills in this challenging Jump'n Run game.

name: Path to Warband
description: Path to Warband is a unique card battler inspired by many of its predecessors. Recruit, promote, and command cards to fight. Events and relics, the Wanted and bounty! And the most fun, fusing effects of cards! Infinite possibilities are waiting for you to be discovered.

name: Pavor
description: Pavor is an online co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. You are a professional electrical repair and ghost exterminator, repairing broken houses and exterminating ghosts as requested.

name: Idle magic herb
description: This game is a hang up game that integrates elements such as cultivating immortals, farming, playing strange things, and collecting cards. Protect the liver and protect the liver.

name: Two Move Chess
description: Chess, but White moves TWICE!

name: Umbra Sepulcri
description: As a necromancer you need to gather the souls of the dead, witness their last moments of life and use their power to defeat your enemies, in this Story-driven/Action/Metroidvania inspired game, set in a beautiful hand-drawn 2D world.

name: Vera: The Last Hope
description: Hack and slash through a frenetic roguelite and cut your way to the Demon King. Upgrade your favorite abilities and equip new ones as you progress, making countless variations each run.

name: Void Eagle
description: Void Eagle is a single player space racer that requires you to dodge obstacles at breakneck speeds while you try to make it out alive. Will you make it and post the fastest time, or go down in a fiery explosion.

name: Sapphire Moon: Forever Memories
description: The story will be accompanied by three heroines, and everyone will find their own love in this real and imaginary world. Is it the dark-skinned school girl who is available, the cold and mysterious girl, or the afterimage that I have been unable to reach in my memory?

name: Wardogz
description: Travel the war-torn world of Hellstain as last of the Wardogz, an ancient order of peacekeepers. Fight a huge variety of enemies, ranging from mutants to the walking mechs anc challenge yourself with puzzles and obstacles that will test you physically and mentally.

name: Warna
description: Try to survive if you can! Soul's like a third-person action game. There are four skills and six types of weapons available, plus bonus weapons that fall from mobs and have a limited number of hits. Three types of potions. All acquired skills, weapons and potions are saved.

name: War of Wizards
description: Draw & cast your spells, magic showdown! War of Wizards is a VR game with MOBA confrontation. Draw dragons to summon dragons to fight for you, draw fireballs to summon fireballs to shoot at enemies, draw pills to heal yourself... - Draw & cast your spells! - Dodge the skills that the enemy fires!

name: Zen Golf
description: Zen Golf is a relaxing and chill mini golf experience. Get lost in the beautiful zen gardens and all original lo-fi Japanese soundtrack with up to 20 friends on over 180 levels! Or play against state of the art AI opponents for rewarding and fun solo play.

name: Zoogarnian
description: Game 2D Platformer Zoogarnian tells how the journey of heroes who want to save animals trapped and caged by monsters. This describes a movement to stop committing violence or cruelty to animals that are around but packaged in an interesting way in the form of a Zoogarnian game.

name: Xearz
description: Xearz is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with a retro feel. It features a multi-plane that can be moved to the front and back. The player uses a melee weapon, the blade, a gun that can use guided and reflective rounds, and subweapons such as grenades to defeat enemies. Weapons can be upgraded.

name: Wren's Journey
description: As the new entrusted soul chosen to be the next Guardian Bear Spirit of the Island of Virtue. You are tasked with connecting yourself within the land and defending it from all else who seeks to cause it harm.

name: Witch's Mystery
description: This is a card game that can wake up your memory

name: Without kidney
description: Without kidney is a shooter metroidvania game with a hero who can hook like spiderman and jump with cannon explosions. Using a grappling hook, a cannon and other bonuses, that can be found on the way, you go forward to the main capitalist boss

name: When We Lost
description: "When We Lost" is a classic horror game in first person perspective. Some day children were missing in mysterious circumstances. There were many rumors and stories about how many people could have been lost, but no one believed in what had really happened so our hero He decided to go take pictures to prove that it was an attempt to hide government experiments.

name: Wild West
description: Wild West is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told a story about the wild west and two lesbians who love to be intimate. One day they met and it started... The game is filled with adult scenes, humor and romance.

name: Kings and Catapults
description:
A 2 player turn-based strategy game with hack n slash element in a fantasy setting.
Players secretly set up their pieces and terrain tiles on their half of the 8x8 battleboard and once both players are ready play commences. Pieces move and attack in a fashion similar to Chess, white moves first then black while other pieces impede your movement. Pieces capture other pieces by moving to occupy the enemy square and removing the enemy piece. Capturing is always the end of your turn. Whoever captures the opposing King first wins however there is no check as in Chess.

name: Lapsus
description: Unravel the mysteries that these forgotten lands hold in this hand-drawn, narrative-driven, 2d action adventure, as a white-robed girl awakens in the depths of an abandoned city.

name: Lewd Guest
description: Our hero who just lost his job and is forced to move out. But gladly his ex-colleague Steve invites him to live in his apartment until our hero finds a new job. But as it turns out Steve doesn't live alone...

name: Light Eater
description: Light shows things that cannot be seen. It creates a comfort of the unknown. But not everything is shown in the light. Don‚Äôt be afraid of the dark. Be afraid of what‚Äôs in the dark. In this game you use the visible light spectrum to avoid unseen dangers and determine possible futures.

name: Lost in the Sand
description: A slow-paced shooter with strategy elements set in a fully destructible environment. Fight with unique weapons in procedurally generated worlds, build and demolish oil extraction camps, manage and upgrade your army in order to conquer the world. The fight for oil has begun!

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1

description: Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 2 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Nova Squadron
description: Dive straight into Jupiter's atmosphere and take down vast flying fortresses from within in fast-paced, arcade flight combat. Losing your plane is just a setback - return with an upgraded replacement and take back lost territory in Nova Squadron's roguelite campaign.

name: Noracam's Slider Challenge
description: Retro 3D slider action game. Beat the 6 slides full of speed brilliantly. There is also an online ranking

name: Ninja Hagakure
description: Ninja Hagakure is a ninja survival game. Defeat the ever-increasing number of enemies with a variety of ninja techniques to suit the situation.

name: Maxwell's Wicked Dollhouse
description: The year is 1997. Skylar Maxwell was known for his research in biotech, realizing that the human mind is capable of connecting with in-organic sources, and using this knowledge to further the field of prosthetics. After a military buyout, he went silent, and this research became a distant rumor.

name: Medieval Warrior Simulator
description: Medieval Warrior Simulator is about brave medieval warrior walk in the cold night to beat the evil monsters

name: Meticulous: Meet All Your Needs
description: This ADV is not to fight with monsters but to explore around the town. Functions such as minimaps and fast-travel are implemented for stress-free gameplay. Please enjoy event scenes which come with both HCG and pixel animations!

name: Microscopic
description: In the year 2066, mankind has finally achieved the pinnacle in medical discovery with the massive deployment of nanotechnology. Play as Venture, a new nanobot in this top down atmospheric adventure game to seek out what went wrong in the medical disaster.

name: ManneKin: Hessler Storage
description: ManneKin: Hessler Storage is a first-person psychological horror. Investigate and explore an abandoned storage facility, uncover the mystery of its previous use, and escape with your life.

name: Magic Market
description: Help fund your arch-wizard overlords' research by trading potions and spells on the Magic Market. Buy low and sell high before the market closes! Master this simple, yet fast-paced, strategy game by chaining spells together to maximize your earnings. But don't get caught cheating the market!

name: Mirror War: Reincarnation of Holiness
description: Mirror War-Reincarnation of Holiness is a 3D arcade shooting RPG with tremendous volume of quests according to epic scenario.Choose one of the sections aiming for hegemony on the world, and lead the race to victory with legendary items and super controls!

name: Motel Styx
description: Come to a Motel on the edge of the underworld and follow a trail of cryptic puzzles to learn the story that brought you here. Motel Styx is a story-driven 3D puzzler. Players can expect a menagerie of escape-room style puzzles and interactive environmental story-telling.

name: Mirror Broken
description: Solve the sleeping puzzle to get the beauties' hearts

name: Miramixi Storyteller
description: Miramixi Storyteller is designed to provide a new gaming experience and convenient functionality for organizing the gameplay of pen and paper RPGs. Share your own worlds where other players can immerse themselves in exciting adventures with a great story.

name: Minschima
description: Minschima is a relaxing puzzle game where you need to match all targets to restore the broken shapes in the board. Pieces move together. Match all targets. Solve puzzles.

name: Mimetic Love
description: Three men and one destiny. What will happen? Difficulties and overcoming. Get ready to live this adventure. Nothing will be as it once was. Everything has its time... And here will not be the exception... Love, jealousy, resentment and forgiveness.

name: Kewbii
description: Make the 'Kewb' roll and explore hundred of colorful stages. Discover and use several powers to complete levels, achieve their quests and solve their puzzles... or you can chill out and create your own ones!

name: Just Drive
description: Make a custom vehical. Race to the finish line, with either friends or strangers. Use your cars speed boost, or flight abilities to navigate around the open world. Shoot lasers and bullets at those who get ahead of you, and send them back to the last checkpoint.

name: Jump Journey
description: Jump Journey is a rogelike 2d side scrolling platformer. Avoid obstacles in this fast-paced game, where the movement never stops. Get gems to unlock upgrades for each run. Play enough runs and you can get permanent upgrades. Each level plays a bit differently, learn to master them all.

name: Jet & Sky
description: Grab a partner and work together to defeat crime on jetskis! Jet and Sky are two old friends from high school who spend their days keeping The City safe from criminals with the help of Sarah3000, the latest in artificial intelligence for jetskis.

name: Jelly in the Dark
description: Jelly bear who fell into an ant kingdom, Lucky! Can he survive with a sweet smell against ants? (Caution! There is not one way out.)

name: Guncar Arena
description: Guncar Arena is an 80s inspired roguelite vehicular combat bullet hell arena shooter. Drive and shoot your muscle car trough alien hordes and tune it with synergizing upgrades to build an absolute engine of destruction!

name: Gold of Lotusland
description: In Gold Of Lotusland you play as the Lead Engineer Daniel Quinn as he uncovers the dark truth about the robots he designed.

name: GodMod
description: GodMod is an asymmetric, cross platform, action survival online multiplayer game designed for up to 8 players, wherein 2 among 8 players will be chosen randomly to eliminate the other 6 players.

name: Glass Bridge
description: This is a Roguelike survival strategy game, where players click on glass to advance and jump, choose the correct glass by chance, and use skills by strategy. It has a certain scary flavor.

name: Forward Team
description: A team of four sets out on a journey to find the magic mirror. Change the position of the adventurers to determine whether they will be greeted byÔºö monstersÔºåtraps,or treasureÔºÅ Your wisdom will lead the brave team through this wonderful adventure!

name: Fold Stories
description: An inner journey mixing exploration and puzzles in a dreamlike origami world.

name: Fishori

name: Final Recurrence

name: Fast or Dead VR

name: Farm Wars: The Farmer's Wrath
description: When alien beings decide to invade and conquer Earth, they don't expect such a powerful enemy: A very angry farmer, join him in the battle against dangerous and lethal aliens and win back the farm that is rightfully yours.

description: Decks Against Destiny is a rogue-like, card collecting, tactics game where the player makes decisions in an overworld that determine in-game events to impact reputation with various factions. A ticking clock to an ending battle is looming, so decisions must be made to determine fate.

name: Deception

Major features:

3 acts of reimagined level design, including one act that has yet to be fully reimagined in any other hack.
A miniboss.
Massive art overhaul all over the place.
Music made by ProjectFM and MechaKnuckles.
Menus!
A custom splash screen.
There's been massive engine overhauls as well, including the Sonic 3 level layout format for massive levels, and the Sonic 3 object manager to go alongside this.

name: Coonwood
description: Coonwood is a multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the alien who crashed on an unknown planet. The other players (1-4) play as raccoons. But in the place where they are located, anomalies occur and the characters begin to possess different abilities.

name: Terramachi: Battle Card Game
description: Terramachi: Battle Card Game is a roguelite card-playing auto-battler, consisting of over 100 evolutions of Machi (monsters), each with a unique ability. By playing cards, players develop their team of Machi; upgrading, evolving, or replacing team members after every round of battle against online opponents.

name: Volatica: The Devil's Trap
description: Volatica. The Devil's Trap ‚Äì is a hand-drawn rogue-like with RPG elements and an original turn-based combat system. Take on the role of the Witch, who fell into a trap and try to deceive the Devil himself!

name: Cubix Worlds
description: Cubix Worlds is a free-to-play Multiplayer 2D Online MMORPG Sandbox Game. You can build awesome worlds with your friends, roleplay with them, farm, mine through caves, customize your character's style and your profile, earn cubix and spend them in the Shop & Marketplace!

name: Armed Fantasia: To the End of the Wilderness
description: Created by veteran game designer Akifumi Kaneko, Armed Fantasia is an RPG built as a spiritual successor to the classic Wild Arms franchise.

name: Everett Isle
description: Everett Isle is an exploration-based puzzle game in which you wash up on a mysterious island, and need to find a way to sail away from this abandoned place.

name: Stupid Squad
description: Stupid squad is pretty weird game.

name: Rooniverse
description: Rooniverse is a pocket multiplayer online game on mobile and PC/Mac. Send your cute and murderous Roos into thrilling PvP modes to harvest resources and build your world!

name: Rally: The Final Round of the World Rally Championship
description: This is a prototype of Rally: The Final Round of the World Rally Championship, an unreleased game by JVC.

name: Wile E's Revenge
description: Wile E's Revenge was the sequel to Road Runner's Death Valley Rally. In this game, you took the role of Wile E Coyote, and chased the Road Runner through various locations in the United States.

name: Wacky Races
description: This is a very early mode-7 racer based on the Hanna-Barbera cartoon that aired in the late 1960s. The game has a large variety of stages, but there is no collision detection, and the opponent racers are not programmed to stay on the track. It looks like it would have been designed to be a Mario Kart clone, complete with weapons and stage hazards, but none of that has been included in this prototype. There is a near final prototype of the Genesis version of the game, which shares many of the same graphics, notably with the background and cars. The layout of the stages is quite a bit more like Mario Kart in the SNES prototype. Of course, it is entirely possible that the final SNES version would have had the same design as the Genesis version if it was completed.

name: Super Full Metal
description: Super Full Metal Planet is an early SNES game by Infogrames. It is based off a French board came called Full M√©tal Plan√®te. It is a turn based strategy game, where the goal is to collect as many ore fragments as possible and stave off rival companies.

name: Prime
description: Prime was an unreleased game by Malibu Interactive based on the comic of the same name.

name: Mr. Tuff
description:
Mr. Tuff is a 2D platform game in development by Sales Curve Interactive (SCI) and presumably set to be published by Ocean in 1994-1995. The game was done by the same people as Super SWIV, and as such, the graphics are incredibly polished. The game was apparently too ambitious, and was never fully complete (although the game engine and graphics certainly indicate that it is close).

The game follows a demolition robot known as Mr. Tuff. After the entire population of earth escapes to the planet Utopia, the army robots take over the world. It is up to Mr. Tuff to save the world for the peaceful domestic robots. The levels involve standard platform action, though there are a few shooter-esce hoverboard levels. Each world is set up into standard levels and a boss level.

name: Sonic Rush 3D
description: A 3D reimagining of the fan favorite 2D platformer, Sonic Rush!

name: Black Stigma
description: Black Stigma is a PvP game that requires a combination of shooting and unique character skills.

name: Atomic Order
description:
Atomic Order is casual simulation game where the player can tap the display to propel a ball towards a cluster of balls. The balls will group together based on certain rules. Balls will disappear if more than three balls are grouped.

Each level consists of 125 sublevels. The full game has a total of 625 sublevels, offering hours of funny 3D bubble popping.

name: Saudi Drift
description:
Play drifting and racing in Saudi Style.
Saudi Drift, drifting and racing and realistic graphics.

name: Sonic Flash
description: A Flash fangame of Sonic The Hedgegog made by Jon Graham

name: InfinityAngel
description: InfinityAngel is a 3D action NFT game from South Korea.

name: Alabaster Dawn
description: Break Nyx‚Äôs curse and guide humanity's rebirth in this top-down 2.5D Action RPG from the creators of CrossCode. Battle enemies with stylish combos, wield multiple divine weapons, solve intriguing puzzles and explore a changing world.

name: Falcon
description: Falcon was an unreleased game by Spectrum Holobyte.

name: Batman
description: This unnamed prototype of Batman, also known as "Real Shitty Batman!", was a game in production by Software Creations.

name: Toxic Crusaders
description: The SNES version of Toxic Crusaders was cancelled by Bandai.

name: Mountain Sports
description: Mountain Sports was an unreleased game in development by DTMC

name: Warrior of Rome III
description: Warrior of Rome III was being developed for both the Genesis and the Snes, but was cancelled for both. The prequels were released on the Genesis. It was likely going to be a strategy game. It was going to be published by short lived Extreme, and was shown at the 1993 Summer CES.

name: Ultrabots: Sanction Earth
description: Ultrabots was an unreleased game by Novalogic.

name: Thunder in Paradise
description: Thunder in Paradise was an unreleased game based on the TV series featuring Hulk Hogan. It was in development by Software Toolworks.

name: Kaboom!: The Mad Doctor's Revenge
description: Kaboom!: The Mad Doctor‚Äôs Revenge was an unreleased sequel to the original 1981 Atari 2600 game.

name: River Raid: Mission of No Return
description: River Raid: Mission of No Return was an unreleased sequel to the original 1982 game and River Raid II (released in 1988), both for the Atari 2600. River Raid was a popular game on the Atari 2600, and with the resurgence of older video game properties in the mid 1990s, Activision decided to capitalize. They had sequels to games like Kaboom, River Raid and Pitfall in development for the SNES, but only Pitfall actually made it out. This game was shown at the 1993 Summer CES, and covered in the EGM 1994 Video Game Preview Guide.

name: Golden Empire
description: Golden Empire is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Culture Brain, which was cancelled before it was released.

name: Tarzan
description: Tarzan is an unreleased game in development by Gametek. Tarzan was mentioned to be in development by Gametek in the June 1993 issue of Nintendo Power. Clayton Kauzlaric, a developer of the game, says that the game was within months of completion. He says that it was canceled due to the fact that you kill off endangered species, and the fact the game wasn't that fun.

name: Boo!
description: Boo! was a unreleased game that was planned for release on the SNES, Genesis and Amiga computers. It was a Mario/Sonic-style platform game.

name: God of Rock: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- God of Rock (base game)
- Season Pass, including:
-- 6 Additional playable characters
-- 4 Additional Stages
-- 20 Additional Songs

name: The Citizen
description: The Citizen is set parallel to the events of the original Half-Life 2. The player takes the role of an ordinary man, pushed over the edge by the oppressive regime controlling his life. His home trashed, his family dead, The Citizen leaves his apartment for the last time. He seeks new friends, and a way to help the human resistance to smash the iron grip of the Combine. What follows is a winding tale of betrayal, determination and grief. Many obstacles lie in his path which require a sleek combination of agility, stealth, intelligence, and sheer violence to overcome

name: Gob
description:
After a deep slumber, a trip to the vending machine spirals into an unintentional journey underground.

Play as Gob to solve the puzzles of your messy home and trudge through the unseen corners of a cavernous tunnel network. Mash things together, break them apart, and observe the environment to get yourself back home.

name: Merge Flower
description:
Merge Flowers is a strategy game, in which we will have to defend our garden from the attacks of the walking dead. This is why we will unite all the flowers that are growing with the intention of sending more and more intense attacks.

In Merge Flowers we will have to use our best strategy in order to unite the same flowers, at the most appropriate time, to find other powerful species. Only in this way will we be able to send many automatic attacks to each of the zombies that approach our surroundings. In fact, at the top of each enemy we will see a status bar with which we will identify their vital state.

At the bottom we will find a golden button through which we can invest the coins that we are going to obtain many. This is how we will increase the rate of attacks and therefore it will be easier for us to kill each zombie and the respective level bosses. However, we will also have a store from which to acquire new characters and functions that make us more powerful.

Merge Flowers is one of those titles in which we won't be able to take our eyes off the screen of our smartphone. The continuous hordes of zombies will encourage us to produce flowers tirelessly and thereby protect our garden from these unpleasant beings.

name: Quietus Allurment
description: Quietus Allurement follows a captured man trapped in a facility that is doing illegal tests on him. Things go awry when the head of the facility began creating creatures and releasing them on the scientists and test subjects. The attacks grew in number until the facility was overrun. Now the captured man must fight his way out to gain his freedom before the creatures kill him as well.

name: Tank Assault
description: Tank Assault is a cancelled third person shooter that was in development by Wicked Witch Software, planned to be released on Nintendo DS.

name: The Last Star
description: Mythical beings, an eternal night, and a fairytale that seems to tie it all together.

name: Hulduf√≥lk
description: You play as an archeologist that is hired to survey a build site, to confirm it doesn't include any ancient artifacts. Before you do that, you spend the night at a Bed & Breakfast where the host warns you of Hulduf√≥lk, a Faroese folklore.

name: The Tavern Online.
description:
The Tavern Online, is an "old-school" MMORPG that brings together the best mechanics and elements of other games.
The game takes place on the continent called Pandora and with the awakening of the monsters that once lay dormant, you'll need to find out what's going on!
Do you have the courage to break through and unravel these mysteries?

name: Rosa Musou
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Avalanche Snowboarding
description: Take part in extreme sports competitions! Ride on your snowboard in wood, stadiums and cities. Upgrade your board in different special stores and get win in tournaments. There are more than 20 various tournaments in different seasons. You can ride even in night‚Äôs competitions! Excellent graphics, many difficult tricks and a lot off adrenalin await you in this phone game!

name: Forlorn Memories
description:
Forlorn Memories is a love letter to the JRPG genre and an upcoming story-driven 3D steampunk fantasy retro inspired RPG with life-sim elements, contemporary storytelling and QoL improvements to create an RPG experience that feels both nostalgic and modern at the same time. The story revolves around a group of heroes who have little in common except their shared quest to recover their lost memories.

‚ÄúMemories are fleeting - what are you willing to sacrifice to remember?‚Äù

name: What da Yak
description: What da Yak (pronounce as What the Yak) is an retro 90's action/arcade game inspired by a classic Thai gaint story. Yak in Thai means È¨º in Japanese. The story in the game is based on memories of old Thai culture related to a giant creature. This game is designed and developed by Nutthaput Chuasuwan. He is a 4th year student at the Department of Interactive Design and Game Development, College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University.

name: TukTuk
description:
Transport customers to their destinations by driving through the streets of the city of Patong ( Thailand ).
Collect the rewards to increase your points, the time available and have the turbo for incredible accelerations.
Make your high score before time runs out and it will be uploaded to the online ranking .

name: Destination Bangkok
description: Try to escape a treacherous thailandese temple !

name: Once upon a Thai: Learn Thai
description:
Once Upon a Thai is an adventure game where the Thai language is magical, and knowing its words grants you power over the environment.

You have to decypher Spells, travel through the map of real Thailand in order to make friends, collect words, and restore balance to the world of Spirit.

No former knowledge is required: you will learn Thai as you progress into the game.

name: Know more Thai
description: Different countries have different culture. When people "Know More Thai" is a full 3D 3rd person game to let its player learn about Thai etiquette and Customs. This game aims at supporting foreigners who plan to visit Thailand to learn about the rules, social believes, and Thai cultures.

name: Angkot d Game
description:
Angkot or commonly abbreviated as Angkot is public transportation with a predetermined route. Unlike a bus that has a stop as a designated stop,
city transportation can be stopped to raise or drop passengers anywhere. The type of vehicle used is a minibus or small bus.
So in this game you will act as an Angkot driver. You must pick up and drop passengers to get targeted money.
You need to pay attention to target, time, and fuel.

name: Suvarnabhumi Mahayuth
description: A historical 16th century mainland Southeast Asia warfare mod.

name: The Kwanstone Project
description: Join the colorful & lively agents of LUANG SENGKEO as they free the mighty guardian spirits known as the KWAN from centuries of imprisonment, solve the mysteries of the destructive VOLENAUTS & save what remains of this magical land; inspired by the lush & majestic culture and people of LAOS.

name: Karpar
description:
Steung Treng province in Cambodia needs your help!

Karpar is a computer platform game based around the Mekong river in Cambodia. As the name suggests (Karpar is Cambodian for protect) the character will protect the local Cambodian community by eliminating waste in various locations around the Mekong river.

name: Garin Game: Curse of Revival Ceremony
description:
MAMUI studio presents a suspense visual novel adapted from Thai top black fantasy novel ‚ÄìGarin Game : Curse of Revival Ceremony-- and let‚Äôs you decide your ending!

In the midnight of night of the month, without the moonlight, a school darkness and silence. Then a candle light show a shadow of horror scene in a classroom.
An unknown alphabet is written all over the floor to magic circle. In the middle of the magic circle showing someone blood.
‚Ä¶This is a part of murder scenes climax in the school!

name: Vietnam War Platoon
description: This game is a new concept card and flag game with the theme of Vietnam War. It is a light snack game prepared for the leisure transition of players who are tired of playing large-scale games like me and hand injured players. 2020.8.10

name: Buramato
description: Explore a vast fast-paced Action RPG inspired by traditional Bornean mythology. Slay monsters with stylish combos and discover the Old Lords‚Äô cursed lands to unravel the secrets behind your lost memory.

name: Find Me in the Maze
description: Revived by a witch, a warrior relive his journey trying to pass the maze and see what happened to him and his friends in the past.

name: Barboozeled
description: A simple walking simulation with a twist, make around the obstacles and out the door while not in full control of your own feet.

name: Roaming through the Rivers
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: DDS Defenders Dark Side
description: Are you ready to fight against hordes of monsters? Choose your Hero and start a journey through the kingdoms of Entelos, defend the magic stone from the forces of the evil King of Darkness! Orcs, Lizardmen, Dark Elven, Undeads, Dark Knights, Demons and Dragons are searching you!

name: Torus
description: Teleport off and on screen to solve complex levels!

name: Hoi An Heritage
description:
Welcome to the Hoi An ancient town! Hoi An is an old town in central Vietnam that retains its ancient beauty from the 15th century. However, many ancient structures are gradually decaying due to the bureaucracy and corruption of the old local government.

As a newly elected mayor, you have to maintain and preserve the architectural heritage of Hoi An and ensure the economic well-being of the people.

name: Siames: Puzzle Heritage Game
description: Help protect and preserve our past, Sukhothai Historical Park, Thailand Game.

name: Machindranaath Raath Game
description:
Rato Machindranath Jatra is a chariot procession honoring the Vajrayana Buddhism deity of compassion Avalokitesvara and as an incarnation of Shiva for Hindu people which is held in Lalitpur, Nepal. It is one of the greatest religious events in the city and the longest chariot festival celebrated in the country.

This game honors the tradition of this festival. This game is made using Godot game engine for Cultural Heritage Game Jam 2021.

name: The Sacred Geography of Kazakhstan
description: Kazakhstan's Sacred Symbols & Geography games make it fun to learn about Kazakhstan's long history, rich and vibrant culture, and beautiful geography.

name: Real Stories from the Grave: Maleficium
description: A dark tale set in 17th century. You play as Liberty, a young girl living in a cottage with her parents and her loved dog. Unravel their story while something evil is lurking around them

description: A chaotic Chess-unlike auto-battler

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Est/Etat 241A Mountain Locomotives
description: Drive these powerful 4-8-2 (241 in the French system) ‚ÄúMountain‚Äù locomotives. Entering service in the early 1930s, these locomotives were built using the De Glehn compound system, like many French locomotives of their time.

name: Trainz Plus: Est/Etat 241A Mountain Locomotives
description: Drive these powerful 4-8-2 (241 in the French system) ‚ÄúMountain‚Äù locomotives. Entering service in the early 1930s, these locomotives were built using the De Glehn compound system, like many French locomotives of their time.

name: Journey to Destiny
description: You are sent with your teammate on a mission by a secret organization. You will have to travel thanks to the documents that will be available in your HQ in order to collect energy stones. But be careful, there are challenges waiting for you. Will you be able to overcome them?

name: Shellrazer
description: You are a Klang Clan Turtle Wrangler and you must ensure your War Turtle completes his annual trek across the Goblin Kingdoms. Battle hordes of goblin archers, ballooners, sheep riders, mutant monsters and steampunk war machines and collect their loot to keep your edge in battle.

name: Beach Boys: You and Me
description: Everyone agrees on the same thing. The most attractive thing in love is a sincere and respectful guy. So, in this game you will have to show your sincerity to make it clear that you are a seducer.

name: Cannon Fodder and Green Game Bundle
description: Bundle of two games: Green Game: TimeSwapper and Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder Devastated

name: Water Is All I Can See
description: Take on the role of an underwater reef explorer, find a way to save the corals from extinction. Dive into the colorful waters of Water, explore and admire the local reef, explore the mystery of the island. Gather resources to create your own bases in order your survival.

name: Blossom's Bloom Boutique
description: Open your flower store and create a beautiful garden landscape that everyone would love to visit!

name: Swallows: Spring in Bishkek
description:
Swallows: Spring in Bishkek is a gaming app designed to stop girls and young women from being abducted and forced into a marriage, a practice known as bride-kidnapping, or ala-kachuu in Kyrgyz.

An interactive story - based on the real-life experiences of abducted women - the game guides users through a scenario where their choices shape the virtual outcome. The game begins when the main character sees her best friend kidnapped into marriage. The player then has to decide what to do next, aided by notes prepared by journalists, lawyers, human rights activists, and psychologists.

name: Indonesian Culture
description:
This game is based on Theme 7 material "The Beauty of Diversity" for 4th grade elementary school students in Indonesia.

This game tells the story of a 4th grade elementary school student named Dimas. Dimas lived his school days normally until one day after school, he fell asleep and dreamed. In his dream he saw a map of Indonesia and he heard a voice telling him to complete a quiz about Indonesian culture so he could wake up from his sleep. With this game, it is hoped that 4th grade elementary school students can learn Theme 7 "The Beauty of Diversity" more fun and not boring.

name: Lite On: Indonesian Culture
description: Lite On is a game with the theme of Indonesian culture. There are 5 maps containing regions in Indonesia, namely Yogyakarta, Banjarmasin, Papua, Padang and Bali. In each area there is knowledge about Indonesian culture such as language, clothing, houses and arts.

name: Umbara the Indonesian Child
description: Umbara the Indonesian Child Educational Game is an adventure game for a child named Umbara who wants to complete a mission to learn about cultural diversity, especially traditional houses and traditional clothes by traveling around Indonesia. This game is intended to make fourth grade elementary school students able to learn about Indonesian Cultural Diversity, especially traditional houses and provincial traditional clothes throughout Indonesia in an easy, practical, interesting, and fun way.

name: Memories of Indonesia
description: When you can't travel, but still want to experience it, this game will take you to Indonesia. This demo will let you travel a little piece of Bogor. Explore the area, fulfill the puzzles and gather these experiences in your travel journal.

name: Chop Shop Simulator
description: Plan unique car thefts, hide them and sell the legalized parts on the market. The simulator will allow the player to experience life in an illegal environment full of gangs and dirty business. Earn a fortune by running your own Chop Shop.

name: Try to Fly
description: Pick up your character and perform crazy stunts on multiple locations

name: Haste-Miner 2
description: In Haste-Miner 2, your main objective is to mine. When mining you earn money as well as tokens which are used to upgrade your pickaxe as well as travel to new mines with more valuable ores. Eventually, you can travel to new planets to mine and earn even more.

name: Illustris
description: A 2D Top-Down game taking place in space. Experience fast paced combat, solve physics based puzzles and travel the whole galaxy.

name: Jade's Adventure
description: Jade's Adventure is a fantasy turn-based strategy game. The player has to become the main character Jade and build an army of various monsters through farming, production, and trading. In limited time and resources, defeat the enemy with various armies!

name: Classic Snake
description: It is what it says on the tin, it's Classic Snake. However there are some in game options, you can change: -play field size -snake speed -food spawn -walls or none

name: Defender of the Oasis
description:
Ufair, an Eastern Prince with courage beyond compare, has been sent by his father, Sultan Aqwa, to confront an evil growing within the kingdom.

Alone and outnumbered, armed with his bravery and skill, Ufair voyages far and wide across the desert dunes of his land.

It is with good fortune that Ufair always carries with him his trusty bow and quiver, luckily he will be able to acquire upgrades along the way to defeat the dark hordes sent forth by the evil Dragon Djinn, Azi Dahaka.

With the Sultan's army frozen by black magic, it is up to Ufair to push back the evil tide and undo the wicked plot set in motion; to poison the kingdom's most precious magic oasis with the blackest sorcery.

Sporting charming graphical design, this old school 2D take on the physics tower defence genre will enthral both the young and the old. Play today and see if you can beat your friends' scores!

name: Jesus Life
description:
‚ÄúJesus Life‚Äù is a short Visual Novel about Jesus of Nazareth.
Join Lucy and Michael in their travel in time to meet Jesus himself and to learn so many things about what he said and did.

name: Tour de Paseban
description:
"Hi, let me introduce myself. I'm Fahrul, the resident of Paseban village. Let me show you ALL things I know, about history and dark secrets of our village! Fuahahahaha."

Follow the journey of Tito dan Fahrul as they visit various location on Paseban village.

name: Twist 02: Baruklinting
description:
The second installment of Twist series, following Twist 01 - Timun mas.
This Visual novel's timeline is 3 days after the event of it's previous installment. Continuing the story about Timun Mas who want to helped her father by killed a dragon and took its pearl. On the other hand, our protagonist, Rekta Letu still trying to find a way to gather the legends and find his missing wife.

name: Twist: Majapahit
description: Story of the rise and fall of the Majapahit empire.

name: Vs. Toukaidou Gojuusan-tsugi
description: A cancelled Nintendo Vs. System port of Toukaidou Gojuusan-tsugi .

description: A cancelled Nintendo Vs. System port of The Wing of Madoola.

name: Okubi
description:
Okubi is a multi-battleground Player-versus-player game where you incarnate a corrupted creature armed to the teeth.
Absorb all sources of life, upgrade your gear and join the ranks in unique, fast-paced and explosive adventures.
Learn new abilities, gather resources to forge powerful items and collect epic rewards to enhance your character. Combine ground and aerial abilities in merciless 20-minutes battlegrounds.

name: Matchday Football Manager Game
description:
Become a football manager. Assemble a squad of football superstars and climb to the top of the soccer manager world.
This is a new and fresh football manager game. This is a football management game unlike any other.
Take charge of your own club built around you. Play matches when YOU want. Test your football manager credentials against players from around the world in exclusive live competitions.

name: Doodle Fit Hell-O-Ween
description: Doodle Fit Hell-O-Ween - A scary special edition of App Store's favorite Doodle-style puzzler!

name: Yerevan Drive
description: Yerevan Drive is the first Armenian 3D game. The objective is to rally in the streets of Yerevan. The menu and the soundtrack are in Armenian. The game also includes a subway.

name: Boomer

Hand crafted challenges, unlock secrets and piece together an adventure through bright, colorful and an inspiring pixel art alongside an 8-Bit Synth Soundtrack.

name: Brick City

name: Dehoarder 2
description: Dehoarder 2 is a simulation where you take control of the life of Harry the Hilldale Hoarder. You must help Harry to get his life in order before the building inspector fines him into oblivion and forecloses on the family home. But change comes hard for Harry, and at first he will only be willing to part with the simplest of things.

name: Bardcard
description:
Bardcard is a card-matching roguelite featuring a mysterious subterranean world to explore. Match cards to advance through the dungeon. Discover helpful equipment, battle dangerous minions, and meet magical familiars that join you on your adventure. Learn the secrets of this realm and discover the truth about the chaos that engulfs it.
Can you find your brother Lukas? Who is ZUG? How far down does this dungeon go?

name: Fisher Frog
description: Cast out your line and catch some fish by moving your lure left and right! Upgrade your rod and boat, casting deeper into the sea and hiring crew members as you go. Discover new fish, gain levels and talents, and delve as deep as you can to uncover what the ocean floor hides. Unlock other characters, fishing rods, spears, lures, and even pets.

name: Error 44

name: Melon
description: Melon is an emotional role-playing puzzle adventure game about piecing together forgotten moments and memories.

name: Closed Island
description: Welcome to the classic RPG. You will plunge into the magical Middle Ages in order to clear the cursed island of various wickedness step by step.

name: Ethernal
description: Ethernal is a roguelike/FPS with a fast action gameplay, combined with powers that give a nice touch of Immersive Sim to the experience. Unlock new weapons, powers and smash hordes of bloodthirsty robots while you discover the secrets of the ERE facilities in Titan, Saturn's moon. Will you survive?

name: Umbilical
description: Umbilical is a Metroidvania-inspired top-down shooter that has you exploring an inhospitable world to stop some nasty parasites from wreaking havoc. Face off against hordes of creatures, seek out new abilities and upgrades, and take down powerful bosses as you fight to stop the parasites.

name: Wyrdsong
description:
A dark, preternatural historical fantasy open-world RPG set in middle-ages Portugal. It is said to be inspired by "The Witch."

This will be the debut title for Something Wicked Games, which was founded by former Bethesda Game Studios designer Jeff Gardiner and Obsidian Entertainment alumnus Charlie Staples. It will be built in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Hitboxer
description: Hitboxer is an action packed "Box vs Box" side-scroller where timing and execution are the keys to victory! Challenge your friends in chaotic free-for-all battles and team based game-modes. Collect power-ups and dodge deadly hazards as you fight for ultimate box supremacy!

name: Phantom Hellcat
description: Phantom Hellcat is a dynamic slasher-platformer with showy combos in a theatrical setting. When demons kidnap Jolene‚Äôs mother, the young woman must take the stage and save her‚Äîbut in the world of plays and props, things are not always what they appear to be.

name: Polygonle
description: Guess the word in 6 tries. Each puzzle includes a series of shapes which correspond to letters in the solution. Puzzles are 6 to 8 characters long.

name: Bloodsaw
description:
A physics-based action game with multiple game modes, and an advanced damage system.

You can play in multiple game modes, like the Arena, Factory, with more being added almost every update.

You can earn skill points in every game mode, and spend them on character upgrades like impact resistance, more damage, higher lung capacity, etc, and powers, like the Dash, Slow-motion, etc.

With the damage system, every limb can be separately damaged, can bleed, can feel pain, and can even break. You can also get concussions, drown, get melted in lava, get cut by sawblades, stomped on by a hammerhead, and more. Oh, and the same applies for all enemies.

name: Dimday Red
description: An Interactive Fiction RPG where you play as Cillian, an assassin working for the Syndicates. Pick and combine Trait cards to shape your personality, choose how you live on the final days of Earth and roll the dice: if you‚Äôre lucky, you won‚Äôt burn before the world does.

name: Edge of Collapse
description: In the dead of winter, an EMP attack destroys the US power grid. For Hannah, however, it‚Äôs the best day in 5 years. She was imprisoned in a psycho's basement - explosion releases the lock of her prison. Now she can begin the search for her family while feeling the breath of her abuser on her neck.

name: Sky Gamblers: Rise of Glory
description:
Earn your wings as a World War I Flying Ace in Sky Gamblers: Rise of Glory! Immerse yourself in WWI combat and the dawn of aerial warfare as you pilot revolutionary flying machines. Take-off solo in mission-based Campaign Mode, or take to the skies online with up to 8 players in real-time multiplayer. Put your flying skills to the ultimate test against players from all over the world!
Choose from a long list of realistic WWI planes and perform dizzying acrobatic maneuvers with an intuitive combination of touch-screen and accelerometer controls. Engage in fierce air-to-air and air-to-ground combat in your pursuit for glory.

name: Age of Procreation DX
description:

Survive until the age of 60 amidst violent wives!
Marry and breed with aliens in a distant planet to return to Earth!
Raise your child to become a superstar!
Raise your children as star athletes to win over the world!
Various scenarios are ready for you to play
where you can do different things with your children.

name: Imperiums: Rome vs. Carthage
description: Imperiums: Rome vs Carthage will test your tactical and strategic genius to the limits. Can the established empires defend the current world order, or will they be forced to make room for new rising states? Go through the fires of war, be destroyed or rise from the ashes to become the new hegemon!

name: Backrooms VHS
description: If you‚Äôre not careful and noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you‚Äôll end up in the Backrooms, where it‚Äôs nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz.

name: Find Your Wings
description: A bite-sized tower defense roguelike!

name: Pens: Ballad of the Erasers
description: A thrilling action/adventure platformer where you jump, run and shoot your way through a weaving narrative in a comical world!

name: Eat Fish, Get Achievements
description: Eat Fish, Get Achievements is a relaxing arcade-style game where you eat fish and unlock new playable characters. The game involves moving around a 2d environment and eating smaller fish than yourself. Some fish have abilities and some change the rules of the game. Get achievements and high scores!

name: Buried in Ice
description: Buried in Ice is a first-person horror game with survival and shooter elements. As a Secret Service Agent, you have been assigned to guard and ensure the correct functioning of an Antarctic research base. Can you survive and solve one of the most concealed mysteries of the U.S. Government?

name: The Book of Aaru
description: Seek ultimate Egyptian god power and reveal it‚Äôs mystery. Fight demons in precision & rhythm based combat, while crawling trough living and everchanging dungeon of Aaru. Experience true rogue-like game with no compromise.

name: Running on Empty
description: Running on Empty is a minimal yet deep post-apocalyptic role-playing game with resource management mechanics (in 64x64 retro pixel graphics!)

name: Merchant Simulator
description: Buy, sell and barter your way to the top! Hire new employees to help you run your shop and choose wisely with your trades. Will you aid your king and community or wring them dry?
